title: Does AD Kennen TOP work?
body: After playing Kennen as a ADC, it really brings me to believe AD Kennen would work top lane? Due to most champs that play top are tanky, if kennen built BORK wouldn't he have heaps of lane dominance? What is better in you opinions AD Kennen or AP kennen (TOP)?

replies.body: I think FNC played ADC Kennen in a lot of games idk if it works now, but Kennen can basically play everywhere ad/ap/tank
Is kennen like the only AP Top champ or am I forgetting something?
Rumble/ Shyvana/ Lulu/ Fizz there are others but there aren't a lot. compared to ad top champions.

Kennen does has a kit which is decent as an ADC yes, however he fulfills a different role generally when picked in top. You typically wont need another source of Ranged ADC in a team comp, however you could use Area of effect CC and burst damage along with a zhonyas which can help you to position/initiate most effectively without risk of being burst. Top lane also brings a lot to the game in terms of tankiness usually which can really help round a team composition. AP Kennen can build Rylai's, Abyssal Scepter and Zhonya's all very effectively to become rather resistant, yet AD Kennen is forced into a build path with less defensive structure, meaning you will be less vulnerable and offer less utility to your team through having an effective zoning tool, rather than having to rely on autoing/kiting. His Teleport plays become far more effective with burst from an AP build too.

This isn't to say that top AD Kennen isn't good! I've played it multiple times and loved it. But if you're looking for long term success in solo queue, it helps to have more to offer to your team through AP Kennen in top lane for a more reliable source of damage through your ultimate and W being easy to use spells. 

Also, having another Magic Damage carry forces your enemy to build more magic resist. Which is quite often harder to incorporate into builds (such as Marksman) which gives your AD carry an easier time in the late game while feeling more protected from a Top lane Kennen with a larger ability to peel and initiate effectively.

This buiold gives you a lot of Armor Magic Resistance Health and Damage, so it's reasonably well rounded.
